comments:

I tried this in the latest 201 build and I am unable to reproduce it. The remove works without the above mentioned error message.
My steps were
1. Get apache geronimo 2.0 server and plugins
2. Create an Ear targeting the server with a web & ejb module (2.5 & 3.0)
3. Attempt to remove the ejb from the ear from properties-j2ee module dependencies


I must say I had seen this error a few weeks ago, but that was before Chuck released a bunch  of changes affecting the model providers. maybe that fixed it.
